clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Study About Extra Virgin Olive Oil "Coratina" in Mild Cognitive Impairment and Alzheimer's Disease Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Study About Extra Virgin Oil "Coratina" (Evoo-c) in Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI) and Alzheimer's Disease (AD) Patients (EVOO-c in MCI/AD)

brief_summary.textblock: Alzheimer's Disease is a neurodegenerative disease age related caused by neurofibrillary tangles misfolding and Beta-amyloid protein accumulation. In the last decade several findings showed the role of biophenols present in diary intake such as extra virgin olive oil as potential antagonist of neurodegeneration. Two population studies (The Seven Countries Study and Three-City-Study) and four clinical trials (PREDIMED, PREDIMED - NAVARRA, ACTRIN and ISRCTN) have already suggested that mediterranean diet or other diets supplemented with extra virgin olive oil could improve cerebral performance.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of cerebral performance after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline MMSE score at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: The change of cerebral performance will be documented by neuropsychological assessement with Minimental State Examination (MMSE) (total score)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of nutritional parameters after olive oil supplementation
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline BMI at 3 months, from baseline BMI at 6 months, from baseline BMI at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Weight and height will be combined to report BMI in Kg/m^2. Nutritional assessment will be measured comparing the variation of BMI of each patient during the follow up.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of neurodegenerative biomarkers after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline neurodegenerative biomarkers at 3 months, from baseline neurodegenerative biomarkerse at 6 months, from baseline neurodegenerative biomarkers at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Neurodegenerative biomarkers will be tested with blood samples and with cerebrospinal fluid analisys (cerebrospinal level of Beta-amiloid, Tau and phospotau, BDNF (pg/mL; blood level of BDNF e NFL (pg/mL))

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of neurodegenerative biomarkers after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline neurodegenerative biomarkers at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Neurodegenerative biomarkers will be tested with blood samples and with cerebrospinal fluid analysis (cerebrospinal level of Beta-amyloid, Tau and phosphotau, BDNF (pg/mL; blood level of BDNF e NFL (pg/mL))

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of optic nerve and macula thickness after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline optic nerve and macula thickness at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Ocular computerized tomography will be performed and layer of retinal nerve fiber will be measured (micron)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of cortical thickness with brain MRI after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.description: Brain MRI will be performed to assess cortical thickness using Normalized Thickness Index (NTI)

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the change of brain amyloid plaque load (BAPL) after olive oil supplementation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline BAPL at 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Beta amyloid positron emission tomography will be performed measuring a index called BAPL.

arm_group.description: 12 patients with Mild Cognitive Impairment or Mild Alzheimer's Disease will receive 10 mg EVOO-C
12 patients with Mild Cognitive Impairment or Mild Alzheimer's Disease will receive 10 mg ROO

intervention.description: Each patient will consume 10 mg total daily amount EVOO-C
Each patient will consume 10 mg total daily amount ROO
